name: Rpg-example
body:
RPG-Example
===========

A simple RPG console game in C++ made with the ncurses library.

Inspired from this example:
[http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lvrxv_i3da0&feature=related](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Lvrxv_i3da0&feature=related)

(The original question: [http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cUqxmaDUjog](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cUqxmaDUjog))

PS: Work in progress...
=======================
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
tagline: A simple RPG console game in C++ made with the ncurses library.
